column5: It's been a while but I finally managed to get a new post up Meal planning is always a big discussion point ahead of our trips.Â  Generally we are looking for a blend of good food, east prep and a budget that doesnt break the bank. To some degree we are also s of weight - to many canned goods = less beer lol This time around we were doing new things - flying commercially and shopping in Thunder Bay and we had a vegan amongst us! https://www.northernjacks.com/post/top-5-meals-from-our-2020-trip  Cheers Andrew
